Of confirmation a sermon preach'd at St. Benedict Grace-Church, March 14th, 1693, the day on which the Right Reverend Father in God, Henry, Lord Bishop of London, confirmed there / by Philip Stubs ... Stubs, Philip, 1665-1738.
[6], 29, [1] p.
Printed for Henry Bonwicke ..., London : 1693.
Half-title: Mr. Stubbs sermon of confirmation. "Published at the request of the parishioners" Advertisements: p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Marginal notes.
